attributes.action: take action to prevent any further building on flood plains to avoid a repercussion of this years devastation in the North of england, also to discard plans to build on the green belt,  this land is a great wildlife habitat and provides a haven for people living in the industrial areas to walk and enjoy the fresh air .It was created by far wiser men then we currently have in power . far sighted people who had the welfare of the populace at heart.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
